root.name: Fairytale
root.description: OverviewThe player controls Nastya, a young girl who lives on a farm with her father, sister, and evil stepmother who has a strong dislike for Nastya. Nastya meets Ivan and they fall in love; later in the game they become separated, and have to find one another and the player has to control both as they find each other.System RequirementsSystem RequirementsWindows 98/ME/2000Pentium 166 MHz32 MB RAMB2 MB video card8 x speed CD-ROM
